content:
Fully-qualified Names (2)

  • SDSI name chain reduction, recursively:

      (name n1 n2 Ö nN) & (name n1) = k1

      _ (name n2 Ö nN)

  • Identical to the process with X.509

  • If there were one naming root, then the root key could be just assumed and not stated.

  • There will never be one root, so all attribute certs need FQNs, probably as shown above.
